content.rendered:
Optical Tech | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time
  • 2+ years optical or eye care experience a plus
  • Will be responsible for creating and adjusting lenses, selling frames and contact lenses
  • Must be able to stand for long periods of time
  • Pay is calculated by years of experience in the optical field
